text: "Somewhere in the Night" is a song originally recorded by The Oak Ridge Boys on their 1981 album Fancy Free. The song was later recorded by American country music group Sawyer Brown. It was released in August 1987 as the first single and title track from the album Somewhere in the Night. The song reached #29 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart.
